business.headline: Pension rules updates: 8 RBI guidelines every pensioner must knowIf a bank accidentally credits more pension than it should to a pensioner, then the bank must consult the Pension Sanctioning Authority before recovering the extra money.
Explained: Why Tata Motors share price has fallen 5% todayTata Motors share price: Tata Motors has gone down 8.68% in the last 5 days, 33.43% in the past month and 38.75% in the last year.

Piyush Goyal slams Indian startups, urges to shift focus from food delivery appsUnion Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal criticised India's startup ecosystem, saying it's too focused on food delivery, betting, and fantasy sports apps. In contrast, he praised Chinese startups for prioritising advanced tech like EVs, batteries, semiconductors, and AI, urging Indian innovators to shift toward deeper, tech-driven innovation.

Sensex down 800 points: 3 reasons behind today's stock market bloodbathStock market crash: The S&P BSE Sensex was down over 817.77 points to 75,477.59 around 10 am, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 22,943.30 to trade below 23,000. Read to know the reasons that led to the stock market crash.

'What has he done?' Startup leaders criticise Piyush Goyal's 'dukaandari' jibeStartup ecosystem leaders' response came after Piyush Goyal took a firm stance and said that while Indian startups were busy building food delivery platforms and fantasy gaming apps, those in countries like China were working on EVs, semiconductors, batteries, and AI.

Sensex tanks over 700 points as Wall Street bloodbath sinks Indian IT stocksStock market crash: The S&P BSE Sensex was down 698.89 points to 75,596.47 at around 10:06 am, while the NSE Nifty50 was trading 269.50 points lower at 22,980.60.

Trump's tariff jitters hit US stocks: Will Sensex, Nifty feel the heat today?The extensive tariff announcements by the US government have raised concerns about a global recession, leading to sharp losses in stock markets worldwide.

Stocks to watch on April 4: Shares in news; HDFC Bank, Zomato, DMartStocks in news today: In Friday's session, shares of Zomato, Nestle India, HDFC Bank, DMart, Mazagon Dock, Bajaj Finance, and others will be in focus due to key corporate developments and financial updates.

Trump tariff blitz wrecks Wall Street, markets suffer biggest fall since CovidTrump's sweeping tariffs sent shockwaves through financial markets, with Wall Street suffering its worst decline since 2020. Analysts warn of economic slowdowns, surging inflation, and a potential recession.

US tech, retail stocks lead rout after Trump's tariff blowTrump's broad tariffs send US markets into a tailspin, with tech, retail, and banking stocks plunging. Apple, Walmart, and Nike face rising costs, while energy prices drop amid economic concerns.

Wall Street opens sharply lower amid trade war fears after Trump tariffsWall Street's major indexes fell sharply after President Trump's new tariffs raised trade war fears. The Dow dropped 2.66%, the S&P 500 declined 3.32%, and the Nasdaq plunged 4.50%, reflecting market uncertainty.

entertainment.headline: SS Rajamouli-Mahesh Babu's next will not be released in two parts: ReportDirector SS Rajamouli will reportedly not be releasing his next film, starring Mahesh Babu and Priyanka Chopra, in two installments.

Empuraan box office Day 8: Rs 100 crore confirmed by 2nd weekend for Mohanlal's filmMohanlal's 'L2: Empuraan' has entered its second weekend at the box office. The film is inching closer to the Rs 100 crore benchmark at the domestic box office.

Ghost-writing to becoming India's Bharat Kumar: Iconic legacy of Manoj KumarLegendary actor Manoj Kumar died on Friday at around 3.30 am in Mumbai. He was 87. We trace his journey in this tribute piece, highlighting what he really stood for.

Sikandar box office day 5: Salman Khan's film inches close to Rs 100 crore markSikandar box office collection Day 5: Salman Khan's action drama Sikandar continues to struggle at the domestic box office. The film, directed by AR Murugadoss, earned Rs 90 crore in just five days.
How Manoj Kumar earned the title 'Bharat Kumar'Veteran actor Manoj Kumar has died. He was 87. Kumar had earned the moniker 'Bharat Kumar' for his work in Hindi cinema.

PM Modi 'deeply saddened' by Manoj Kumar's death: He was an icon of Indian cinemaPrime Minister Narendra Modi mourned the death of veteran actor Manoj Kumar. The Kranti actor died at a private hospital in Mumbai. He was 87.

Veteran actor Manoj Kumar dies at 87 after battling health issues, tributes pour inVeteran actor Manoj Kumar, who was known for films, 'Roti, Kapada Aur Makaan' and 'Kranti' died at a private hospital in Mumbai. His cremation will take place on Saturday.

Tom Cruise honours 'dear friend' Val Kilmer with a moving tribute at CinemaConTom Cruise paid a touching tribute to his late co-star Val Kilmer at CinemaCon, recalling his immense talent and their special bond. Kilmer, known for roles in Batman Forever and The Doors, died on April 1, leaving a lasting legacy in Hollywood.

Imran Khan reveals how girlfriend Lekha helped him adopt a better lifestyleBollywood actor Imran Khan opened up about how his girlfriend, Lekha Washington, brought significant changes to his lifestyle. He shared an anecdote about not having plates for guests before her influence.

Ajith Kumar goes go-karting with wife Shalini, son Aadvik in ChennaiActor Ajith Kumar is currently on a break in Chennai, spending quality time with his family. He recently enjoyed an exciting day of go-karting with his wife, Shalini, and their son.

Zeenat Aman recalls shooting Pukar song in 'titillating outfit'Veteran actor Zeenat Aman took her fans on a nostalgic journey as she recalled the filming of the iconic song Samundar Mein Naha Ke with Amitabh Bachchan. The shoot was Amitabh Bachchan's comeback after his life-threatening accident on the Coolie set.

The film delves into themes of grief, heritage, and the enduring bonds that connect us across generations.

ED raids Empuraan producer's chit fund firm offices in Tamil Nadu, KeralaThe Enforcement Directorate raided the Chennai offices of Sree Gokulam Chits, a chit fund company owned by Gokulam Gopalan, one of the producers of the Mohanlal-starrer Empuraan. Sources said the raids were in connection with alleged violations of FEMA rules.

Congress to challenge 'unconstitutional' Waqf bill in Supreme CourtCongress MP Abhishek Manu Singhvi said there is a "big chance" that the Waqf bill would be declared unconstitutional as the party prepares to move the Supreme Court against the contentious legislation.

What will Indian astronaut Shubhnashu Shukla do in space?Isro is sending six experiments to the ISS aboard the Ax-4 mission, each designed to contribute to our understanding of space and its effects on various biological systems.

Rs 2 lakh iPhone? Trump tariffs may drive prices up by 40%Your next iPhone could be a lot more expensive. If Apple passes on the cost, a $799 iPhone could jump to $1,142, and the iPhone 16 Pro Max might hit $2,300. With sales already struggling, higher prices could hurt Apple even more.

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.
